Name: Lend a Hand?
UnlockCondition: After completing the "Reel In the Goods" quest.
Inquire: So, same deal as last time but different materials. Could you get me two leather, a flintlock pistol from the Arms Dealer and a zombie arm. What? I just need it, it's important!
Objective: Collect 2 Leather, 1 Flintlock Pistol, 1 Zombie Arm
Reward: Goblin Tinkerer begins selling Gun Glove
